title: Melt
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Specializes in waffles. Has a vegan menu section which includes offerings such as waffles topped with vegan sausage, Daiya cheese, avocado, tofu scramble, chili, vegan dilly sauce, etc. Offers a make your own scramble choice which can be made with tofu. Any of the concoctions on the main menu can be made with a vegan waffle, but ask about the add-ins. This place has a funky atmosphere with some old style arcade games. Serves cocktails and beer.
